name: Whey Protein Isolate (5lbs)
description: Ultra-pure 90% protein content with minimal lactose. Perfect for post-workout recovery with 24g protein per scoop. Contains digestive enzymes for better absorption. Gluten-free and low in carbs.

name: Creatine Monohydrate (300g)
description: Pharmaceutical grade creatine that increases ATP production for explosive strength gains. Clinically proven to enhance performance by up to 15%. Increases muscle volume and power output.

name: BCAA 2:1:1 Formula (400g)
description: Optimal ratio of leucine, isoleucine and valine to reduce muscle breakdown during training. Includes electrolytes for hydration support. Unflavored version mixes easily with any beverage.

name: Nitric Oxide Pre-Workout
description: Contains 300mg caffeine, 6g citrulline malate and beta-alanine for explosive energy and pumps. No artificial colors or unnecessary fillers. Designed for advanced athletes.

name: Mass Gainer (12lbs)
description: High calorie formula with 50g protein, 250g carbs and added digestive enzymes per serving. Perfect for hardgainers looking to add quality mass. Includes MCTs for clean energy.

name: L-Glutamine Powder (500g)
description: Supports immune function and reduces muscle soreness. Helps maintain nitrogen balance and prevents catabolism during intense training periods. Mixes easily with no aftertaste.

name: Fat Burner Thermogenic
description: Advanced formula with green tea extract, cayenne pepper and caffeine to boost metabolism and energy levels while suppressing appetite. Supports fat oxidation and thermogenesis.

name: Post-Workout Recovery
description: 2:1 carb-to-protein ratio with added glutamine and BCAAs to maximize glycogen replenishment. Reduces cortisol levels post-exercise. Scientifically formulated for optimal recovery.

name: Casein Protein (4lbs)
description: Slow-digesting protein ideal for nighttime use. Provides sustained amino acid release for up to 7 hours to prevent muscle breakdown. Micellar casein for maximum absorption.

name: Joint Support Complex
description: Contains glucosamine, chondroitin and MSM to support joint health and reduce inflammation from heavy training. Essential for lifters and athletes with joint stress.

name: Multivitamin Performance
description: Comprehensive vitamin and mineral formula optimized for athletes. Includes antioxidants and performance nutrients to support intense training demands and overall health.

name: Omega-3 Fish Oil
description: High potency EPA/DHA fatty acids to support heart health, brain function and reduce inflammation. Molecularly distilled for purity and no fishy aftertaste.

name: Natural Test Booster
description: Contains tribulus, fenugreek and ashwagandha to support healthy testosterone levels. Increases strength, libido and recovery capacity.

name: Electrolyte Complex (90 tabs)
description: Perfect balance of sodium, potassium and magnesium to prevent cramping during endurance activities. Includes B-vitamins for energy metabolism.

name: CLA Softgels (180ct)
description: Conjugated linoleic acid shown in studies to reduce body fat while preserving lean muscle mass. Supports metabolic rate and fat oxidation.

name: EAA + Hydration Formula
description: All 9 essential amino acids with coconut water powder for intra-workout hydration. Enhances endurance and delays fatigue.

name: Vegan Protein Blend
description: Plant-based protein combining pea, rice and hemp proteins for complete amino acid profile. Dairy-free and easily digestible.
